description:
The ghostly voices of children cry out at night from a haunted bed.  A man tries a new strategy to sell his wares.  The dancing bones of a murdered man bring fame and wealth to the one who killed him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Story of Futons / Chakurikakifu / The Dancing Bones
Futon no Hanashi / Chakurikakifu / Odoru Gaikotsu
ふとんの話 / ちゃくりかきふ / 踊る骸骨
